page.title: 10Homes in Norham
page.content: Kitchens contain vinyl floor covering, fitted units,electric washing machine, refrigerator/freezer, electric cooker, and some have micro-wave ovens. The living-room contains either a conventional "three-piece suite" of settee and two armchairs, or units which combine to provide similar seating, a sideboard or display unit, coffee table and television set. Many have music centres, and some have video-recorders or home computers. Fitted carpets are usual throughout the house. Dressing table, drawers and wardrobe are average bedroom furniture. Beds are usually of the divan type, with duvets rather than blankets. The bathroom is utilitarian. Showers are becoming popular, usually sited over the bath.
